oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Application of the Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling reaction for the modification of phenylalanine peptides
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
LAHIN, K
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: amino-acid derivatives
ring-closing metathesis
diels-alder reaction
2+2+2 cycloaddition strategy
enyne metathesis
tic derivatives
solid-phase
synthetic approach
chemical synthesis
drug discovery
suzuki-miyaura coupling
post-translational peptide modifications
boronic acids
heterocycles
combinatorial chemistry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have demonstrated an exceptionally simple and a useful methodology,for modification Of unusual phenylalanine peptides by adapting the building block approach using the Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling reaction as a key step. This strategy gave a good overall yield of various modified tri- and pentapeptides that may be useful to prepare various biologically active peptides in a short period of time. (C) 2003 .
